192.168.35.19/30

       192.168.35.48   => 11000000.10101000.00100011.00010011
/30 => 255.255.255.252 => 11111111.11111111.11111111.11111100

11000000.10101000.00100011.000100 11

11111111.11111111.11111111.111111 00

Network Address :

11000000.10101000.00100011.000100 00 => 192.168.35.16

30-24(Class C) => 6 bits are borrowed from host portion

Number of Subnets possible => 2^6 => 64

Number of host bits remaining available => 8(default) - 6(subnetbits) => 2 bits

Number of Hosts possbile in each subnet => (2^2)-2 => 4-2 => 2

Firt Host Address => 11000000.10101000.00100011.000100 01 => 192.168.35.17

Last host address => 11000000.10101000.00100011.000100 10 => 192.168.35.18

Previous Subnet Address:

11000000.10101000.00100011.000011 00 => 192.168.35.12

Next Subnet Address:

11000000.10101000.00100011.000101 00 => 192.168.35.20

Broadcast Address:

11000000.10101000.00100011.000100 11 => 192.168.35.19

Previous IP Address to the current host(IP) address:

11000000.10101000.00100011.00010010 => 192.168.35.18

Next IP Address to the current host(IP) address :

11000000.10101000.00100011.00010100 => 192.168.35.20
